text: Kafr Qasim (, ), also spelled as Kafr Qassem, Kufur Kassem, Kfar Kassem and Kafar Kassem, is a hill-top city in Israel with an Arab population. It is located about east of Tel Aviv. ==References== ==Other websites== * Kfar-Qasem municipality website * Kufur-Kassem home page * Kufur-Kassem official home page *Survey of Western Palestine, Map 14: IAA, Wikimedia commons * the village location * Material in English * Material in Hebrew כפר קאסם בעברית * Welcome To Kafr Qasem Category:Cities in Israel Category:Central District (Israel)
title: Kafr Qasim
